attributes.action: Look at the way recovery vehicles can be differentiated from other vehicles and save some of our collegues lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a growing concern for the safety of all recovery operators working at the roadside. Amber beacons are not enough to warn the general public, as too many vehicles already use amber beacons i.e. milk floats council vehicles and farm tractors to name a few. we think that we should be able to legally use rear facing red flashers at the very least, better still amber/red beacons (red to face the rear and amber to face front) There are far too many operators killed or seriously injured on our roads each year for this to remain as the present legislation stands

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Look at the way recovery vehicles can be differentiated from other vehicles and save some of our collegues lives."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18375
